instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: IMAC 27 " 2009 cpu fan stuck on high .
threads.message:
hi guys,
                     need your advise here . this imac cpu fan is running high.
so far steps taken are
1. reset pram
2. reset smc
3. removed rtc battery and tried 
4. checked the lcd sensor cable
5. checked the hdisk sensor cable ( hd fan running fine)
6. optical fan running fine aswell
7. checked the resistor near cpu fan 


                   system is running smoorth . only issue is the crazy cpu fan running extremely high 
Please advise
thanks

threads.title: IMAC 27 " 2009 cpu fan stuck on high .
